actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reward those Americans who provide volunteer services in times of national need.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Assistance to Individuals Delivering for America Act of 2009 or the AID for America Act of 2009- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a business tax credit for 50 percent of the wages paid to employees serving as disaster relief volunteers. Limits the amount of such credit to $100 per day per employee.

titles.title: Assistance to Individuals Delivering for America Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reward those Americans who provide volunteer services in times of national need.
